item.title: President Macron has reappointed Sébastien Lecornu as French prime minister - four days after his resignation. Lecornu had resigned as PM on Monday after 26 days in the job and he said two days later his "mission is over". #EmmanuelMacron #France #Sebas

item.title: Under the terms of the Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal, the amount of aid entering Gaza is due to be scaled up. The UN estimates that at least 600 aid trucks are needed every day to start addressing Gaza's humanitarian crisis. #BBCNews
